name: The Masters of Serebal
overview: Masters of Serebal is a 2D top down RPG game. The player must recover the 10 lost Scrolls of Law. To do this, the player goes to Serebal Master, Altaborn - this person will help the player. The game has two main modules - the world, after which the player travels between different sites and cities and module battle - when the opponent randomly appear, the game generates the grounds on which the player must defeat him. Win the battle gives player extra money. He must be considered on the level of stamina - if this reaches zero, the player dies. He must eat, drink and rest.
